title: Supreme Court Takes Up Cell Tower Case (Audio)
itunes:title: Supreme Court Takes Up Cell Tower Case (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Robert Mintz, a partner at McCarter and English, and Ilya Shapiro, a senior fellow in Constitutional Studies at the Cato Institute, discuss the Supreme Court case Carpenter v. United States, which could decide whether police need a warrant to obtain mobile-phone tower records. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
